QuestData.Title: Break in Communications: Rutsak's Guard
QuestData.Description: <The F.C.D. hums.>$B$BOur next outpost is Rutsak's Guard, located due east of Dreadwatch. Make your way to Rutsak's while avoiding the worgen rushers, $n. You don't want to deal with those monsters by yourself.$B$BIf you make it there in one piece, look for Captain Rutsak.$B$BJust be prepared for the worst.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Rutsak's Guard protected our right flank.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Captain Rutsak at Rutsak's Guard in the Ruins of Gilneas.
QuestData.RewardText: Th... Af... After we lost Gilneas City, the port fell.$B$BHU... HUM... HUMANS ARE HERE! Reinforcements from Stormwind! They slaughtered my men. Left me alive to witness their strength. To tell high command... To tell them that the 7th Legion are here...
